or size to meet gauge 3 **notions ** removable stitch markers 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 **yarn ** lion brand color theory 7 100% acrylic 246yds/100g colorway shown bone weight 4 worsted **yarn substitutes ** brava worsted 8 - 100% premium acrylic 218yds/100g mighty stitch 9 - 80% acrylic/20% superwash wool 208yds/100g swish worsted 10 - 100% fine superwash merino wool 110yds/50g heatherly sport 11 - 80% acrylic 20% merino wool 328yds/100g **yardage ** 1150 1190 1250 1400 1500 1700 1900 2150 2375 yds 6 6 6 7 7 8 9 10 11 balls **abbreviations ** chain - chain blo - back loop only flo - front loop only half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet hdc2tog - half_double_crochet two together rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet skip - skip slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es ws - wrong side **gauge ** 17 sts and 11 row = 4 by 4 in established stitch pattern blocked not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 12 **sizes ** xs s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x to fit chest 32 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 actual measurements are in schematic this garment is meant to be worn with a 3-5 inch positive ease **skill level ** advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 13 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 14 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 15 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 16 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 17 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 18 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2024 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner you are welcome to
